body: This fixes the problem with NAG compiler for versions of OpenMPI that are based on Libtool 2.4.6. Versions that use older versions of Libtool need to be patched too but I assume that nobody is interested in them. The problem is reported upstream a year ago: https://github.com/open-mpi/ompi/pull/6378.
title: OpenMPI: patch for NAG.
